thread.title: Caroline and Dave in Paris
thread.title_full: Caroline and Dave in Paris - Review of Hotel Residence Foch, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: DaveCh
title: Caroline and Dave in Paris
text: My better half booked this hotel, so apart from a quick look at some photos I hadn't seen much about it before we arrived. I loved it; bijou (as they say in France) and welcoming, the staff were friendly and smiling every time we walked in the door. It's maybe 5 minutes walk from the Porte Dauphine metro and 25 minutes from the Arc de Triomphe making it the perfect base for exploring Paris. I highly recommend Hotel Residence Foch, Caroline and I will certainly be staying there again next time we're in Paris. Thanks to the staff for a lovely stay. HRF definitely deserves a full 5 across the board.
